Have Weapons [Crapulecorp]
004615C3 0000000X
004615C7 0000000X
*Repace X for :
00 = Normal Gun
01 = Shotgun
02 = Laser
03 = Missile Launcher*
*Code ported from ZiT Ntsc Jap Version*
